A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars the last jedi takes a lot of risks and some of them work and others do not. Kylo Ren is one of the best characters in all of Star Wars in my opinion and in this movie he really shines. Holdo\, Rose and Canto Bait are 3 things in this movie that feel very out of place in a Star Wars movie. but everything else in this movie is bold\, epic and an amazing addition to the franchise.
